texts.value: Catalyzes the conversion of 4-hydroxyphenylpyruvic acid to homogentisic acid, one of the steps in tyrosine catabolism
Amino-acid degradation; L-phenylalanine degradation; acetoacetate and fumarate from L-phenylalanine: step 3/6
A number of isoforms are produced. According to EST sequences.

citation.title: Cloning of an Arabidopsis thaliana cDNA for p-hydroxyphenylpyruvate dioxygenase.

Sequence and analysis of chromosome 1 of the plant Arabidopsis thaliana.
Araport11: a complete reannotation of the Arabidopsis thaliana reference genome.
Empirical analysis of transcriptional activity in the Arabidopsis genome.
Structural basis for herbicidal inhibitor selectivity revealed by comparison of crystal structures of plant and mammalian 4-hydroxyphenylpyruvate dioxygenases.
